What is this? This is my dedication to the creative team behind Pixar's movie The Incredibles. I loved the depth of the world, the buildings, the gadgets and most of all I loved the chairs.

Credit is due to everyone involved at Pixar, but in particular Nelson Bohol, Scott Caple, Mark Holmes, Bryn Imagire, Albert Lozano, Teddy Newton, Tony Fucile, Mark Andrews and Brad Bird. An extra special thanks goes to Lou Romano for his input to the film and his help compiling this list.

Enjoy!

All images are from The Incredibles by Pixar.
